body_html: @poxvoculi it looks like your change added the AddAllocVisitor() and AddFreeVisitor() methods to MklCPUAllocator, then delegated their functionality to the allocator_ data member. But wouldn't you also need to change the declaration of allocator_ to be a VisitableAllocator* itself, so that the delegation would work?
body_text: @poxvoculi it looks like your change added the AddAllocVisitor() and AddFreeVisitor() methods to MklCPUAllocator, then delegated their functionality to the allocator_ data member. But wouldn't you also need to change the declaration of allocator_ to be a VisitableAllocator* itself, so that the delegation would work?
body: @poxvoculi it looks like your change added the AddAllocVisitor() and AddFreeVisitor() methods to MklCPUAllocator, then delegated their functionality to the allocator_ data member. But wouldn't you also need to change the declaration of allocator_ to be a VisitableAllocator* itself, so that the delegation would work?
